Row.Text: A unique university for japan which costs more to produce. Unlike the university it replaces, the dojo increases science produced in that city by 35% and provides 2 science. Additionally the dojo provides 15 experience for land units. Allows Archaeologists to be built in this City

A unique university for japan which costs more to produce. Unlike the university it replaces, the dojo increases science produced in that city by 35% and provides 2 science. Additionally the dojo provides 15 experience for land units. Allows Archaeologists to be built in this City

The dojo is japanese building used for learning and training. Dojos were used to teach younger members of society the ways of japanese culture, from martial arts to sciences. Wiki link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dojo
